itunes:title: Bonus Episode 4: The She Reads Truth Community
title: Bonus Episode 4: The She Reads Truth Community
description:
For this week's bonus episode, Raechel and Amanda are joined by SRT marketing director and podcast guest host, Hannah Warren. Together the three explore why community matters so much to She Reads Truth, what the Bible has to say about it, and why we'd be honored for you to be a part of it. Whether you've been with us since day one or this is your first time joining in, we hope this episode serves as an invitation to join us in our pursuit of being women in the Word of God together every day. 

Read with Us: 

Join our community this week as we continue the She Reads Truth Women & Men in the Word: New Testament reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Women & Men in the Word: New Testament collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Save 15% on your first Subscription Box when you use the code BOX15. July’s box will include our upcoming Ephesians Study Book.

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/bonus-episode-4-the-she-reads-truth-community
